short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Preview Live while you are writing at Dev.to Editor.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Preview Live while you are writing at Dev.to Editor.

While you are writing your article as a markdown file on dev.to platform you have to navigate to another page to check the preview. 
Using the extension you don't have to navigate to different page, with just click of a button you will be able to see the preview of your article content written as markdown. 
This will reduce the round trip for a writer since now you have to navigate to and fro to preview page and editor to make changes.
